name: Forest Spirit
description:
Life in nature

Will an ordinary city dweller be able to cope with nature? You will have to start living with a clean slate and settle down in a new place.

Your own farm

Get resources and build up your farm.

Neighbours

Locals will help you settle down in a new place.

Adventure

Explore dangerous places and fight monsters.

Fishing

Relax with fishing. Go to the river or sea with a fishing rod. You can catch a wide variety of fish and more.

Animal husbandry

Animals are very useful in the farm. Get yourself animals and don't forget to take care of them.

Garden

Also do not forget to look after plants and flowers.

Cooking

Cook various meals. As a person leading an active lifestyle and protecting the farm from monsters, it is important for you to eat well.
